items.content_html: Friends is a lightweight social network web app where users can create profiles, make posts, add friends, and explore mutual connections. Built with FastAPI (Python) for the backend and HTML/CSS/JavaScript for the frontend, the platform models relationships using a graph-based structure to suggest mutual friends and visualize user connections.
items.title: Rasmeh27/Friends---Social-graph-App: Friends is a lightweight social network web app where users can create profiles, make posts, add friends, and explore mutual connections. Built with FastAPI (Python) for the backend and HTML/CSS/JavaScript for the frontend, the platform models relationships using a graph-based structure to suggest mutual friends and visualize user connections.
